running a simulation we often want

can see right now there's this real-time
factor 0.93 so sometimes we want gazebo

we're doing the physics simulations and

nodes that are running in the system to
understand that gazebo is in charge of
keeping time and so when gazebo is
running it'll actually be
publishing to a topic called clock

and so you can see gazebo is constantly
